Trade/Device Name(s): ACON BAR II One Step Barbiturates Test Strip
ACON BAR II One Step Barbiturates Test Device
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Competitive binding lateral flow immunochromatographic assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACON BAR II One Step Barbiturates Test Strip and Device for qualitative detection of Barbiturates in urine via immunochromatographic assay
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection of Barbiturates in urine at 300 ng/mL cutoff, intended for healthcare professionals including point-of-care sites; preliminary screening only, confirmation required by specific alternate chemical methods such as GC/MS.
